query:
UPDATE app.projects
            SET
                status = COALESCE($1, status),
                name = COALESCE($2, name),
                visibility = COALESCE($3, visibility),
                crs_srid = CASE WHEN $4 THEN $5 ELSE crs_srid END,
                slug = COALESCE($6, slug),
                last_updated = NOW(),
                last_updated_by = $7
            WHERE id = $8
            RETURNING id
